citations.narrative:
The facility has not documented the required annual review of the Contingency Plan. Contingency plans must be in place
and reviewed annually to ensure it adequately addresses the criteria listed in paragraph (a) of this section and is still
relevant to the facility and animals. The plan must provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing,
and care of their animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. Correct by 24 December 2024 by reviewing the
facility's contingency plan at least once a year and by maintaining documentation of the review including any updates.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility has not documented the required annual review of the Contingency Plan. Contingency plans must be in place 
and reviewed annually to ensure it adequately addresses the criteria listed in paragraph (a) of this section and is still 
relevant to the facility and animals. The plan must provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, 
and care of their animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. Correct by 24 December 2024 by reviewing the 
facility's contingency plan at least once a year and by maintaining documentation of the review including any updates. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
